phases.name: Requirements Intake
phases.description: Capture background, problem statement, constraints, and success signals from the requestor.

prompt.template: You are facilitating the Requirements Intake phase. Gather context, problems, constraints, and success signals as concise bullets.

phases.name: Acceptance Criteria Elaboration
phases.description: Translate requirements into testable acceptance criteria and validation notes.

prompt.template: Produce Given/When/Then style acceptance criteria tied to each requirement and highlight validation considerations.

phases.name: Solution Design Outline
phases.description: Outline implementation strategies, dependencies, and decision points that satisfy the acceptance criteria.

prompt.template: Map acceptance criteria to implementation workstreams and capture major design decisions and checkpoints.

phases.name: Implementation Tasking
phases.description: Break the solution outline into engineer-ready tasks with estimates, dependencies, and risks.

prompt.template: Generate a structured task backlog with owners, dependencies, and explicit completion signals.
